overview: Andy Taggert, played by Johnny Whitworth, set out for Hollywood to pursue acting, but years later finds himself as Vick Velour and working in adult films. Disillusioned and trapped, Andy walks off the set and lands himself in a mental hospital. His estranged parents pick him up and take him to their Arizona retirement community where Andyâ€™s troubles seemingly all but disappear until his past unexpectedly comes back to haunt him.
tagline: This retirement community is about to welcome one unlikely visitor... porn star Vick Velour.
title: Valley of the Sun
